messages.title: Three great reasons to back the Lib Dem team
messages.content: Jackie Porter has lived here for 35 years and represented local people as a councillor since 1991. She is a former teacher who runs two local charities.

messages.title: All forecasts predict a hung parliament after May 7
messages.content: We need Lib Dem MPs to hold the balance of power. If there are not enough Lib Dem MPs, a government led by either the SNP or UKIP could have our schools and the NHS.

messages.title: It's so close here!
messages.content: How you voted last year: Lib Dem 39%, Con 37%, Lab 11%, Ukip 9%, Green 1%. The elections this year are between the hard-working local Lib Dems and the right-wing Conservatives. Voting for any other party might mean a Conservative MP and a Conservative Councillor.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Local Lib Dems will reform our council to make it more open and transparent. We'll improve recycling and support affordable homes.
The Lib Dems will balance the books by 2018 AND protect services - £8 billion for the NHS and education spending protected.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Voting for any other party might mean a Conservative MP and a Conservative Councillor.

issues.economy: The Lib Dems will balance the books by 2018 AND protect services - £8 billion for the NHS and education spending protected.
issues.environment: We'll improve recycling and support affordable homes.
issues.governance: Local Lib Dems will reform our council to make it more open and transparent.

leaflet.personalStatement: Jackie Porter has lived here for 35 years and represented local people as a councillor since 1991. She is a former teacher who runs two local charities.

politicalExperience.achievements: Represented local people as a councillor, runs two local charities.

endorsements.endorsement: On Thursday I’ll be voting for Jackie Porter. She’s the best hope we’ve got to beat the Tories – and keep Ukip out of Winchester. The last thing we need is another five years of Tory rule and more savage cuts to services we all rely on.

quotes.text: All forecasts predict a hung parliament after May 7

images.caption: Jackie Porter has lived here for 35 years and represented local people as a councillor since 1991. She is a former teacher who runs two local charities.
The Lib Dems will reform our council to make it more open and transparent. We'll improve recycling and support affordable homes.
The Lib Dems will balance the books by 2018 AND protect services - £8 billion for the NHS and education spending protected.
